item.title: You do not have to be good
item.description:
You do not have to be good.
You do not have to walk on your knees
For a hundred miles through the desert, repenting.
You only have to let the soft animal of your body
love what it loves.

Instructions for living a life:
Pay attention.
Be astonished.
Tell about
item.dc:creator: 杜兵
item.content:encoded:
You do not have to be good.
You do not have to walk on your knees
For a hundred miles through the desert, repenting.
You only have to let the soft animal of your body
love what it loves.

Instructions for living a life:
Pay attention.
Be astonished.
Tell about it.

Pay attention to what you pay attention to.

item.title: 有哪些推荐的时事新闻类APP？
item.description:
目前我主要还是在电脑上看新闻，几个渠道：

1、RSS客户端，许多网站上有一个RSS图标，可以点击，将它保存到RSS客户端。一旦更新，客户端可以收到。

2、邮件订阅。有些网站上有Newsletter订阅功能，填入邮箱后会收到更新。

3、网页阅读。比如人民日报、各地大报纸，网页都可以直接阅读。

4、Google搜索关键词订阅，一旦有新结果，可以收到邮件提醒。

另外也会看一些手机上的公众号，但喜欢偏个人化的。
item.dc:creator: 杜兵
